forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
